steps.text: Put all ingredients into a cold pan, and gradually heat, whisking constantly.
Remove from the heat when the mixture noticeably thickens - there will be thicker custard on the base of the pan when tipped.
Pour the mixture through a sieve into a 1L measuring jug, and refrigerate for at least 4 hours until cold, preferrably overnight.

Start the ice-cream churn and slowly pour in the vanilla mixture. Churn for 20 minutes, or until the mechanism begins to skip. Decant from the churn bowl into a container and freeze for at least 2 - 3hrs before eating.

notes.text: Pour melted chocolate (melted in a bowl over boiling water) in towards the end of the churn time to make stracciatella.
